meanings.definition: A genus of aquatic plants with large, round leaves and showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The nelumbium in the pond has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a nelumbium plant with big leaves in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The nelumbium's leaves looked like green umbrellas floating on the water.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a nelumbium paradise, full of colorful blooms.
meanings.sent5: The nelumbium's flowers stood out like jewels in the water garden.

meanings.definition: The dried rhizome of the nelumbium plant, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist used nelumbium in his remedies.
meanings.sent2: Nelumbium rhizome is believed to have healing properties.
meanings.sent3: Grandma brewed a tea with nelumbium to cure a cold.
meanings.sent4: The nelumbium rhizome was like a magic potion in the old medicine book.
meanings.sent5: The scent of nelumbium filled the room, bringing comfort and calmness.

meanings.definition: The flower of the nelumbium plant, often used in floral arrangements.
meanings.sent1: The florist arranged a bouquet with nelumbium flowers.
meanings.sent2: Nelumbium blooms add elegance to any floral display.
meanings.sent3: The wedding centerpiece featured delicate nelumbium blossoms.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a nelumbium in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The nelumbium flower symbolized purity and beauty in the arrangement.
